meanings.sent1: I put out birdfeed in the garden to attract colorful birds.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of birdfeed for different types of birds.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the birdfeed for a snack and had a feast.
meanings.sent4: The birdfeed scattered on the ground was like a buffet for the hungry birds.
meanings.sent5: The chirping of the birds around the birdfeed created a lively atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: I make sure to birdfeed the birds in my backyard every morning.
meanings.sent2: The kind neighbor always takes the time to birdfeed the birds in the park.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to birdfeed the birds as a fun activity during their picnic.
meanings.sent4: The act of birdfeeding the hungry birds brought joy to the birdwatchers.
meanings.sent5: She loves to birdfeed the birds and watch them happily chirping away.
